content: Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Andrew does a heck of a job in the finance team helping us make those right decisions, but right now we feel really good about our business and where we stand right now and we're going to continue to focus on originations, building our servicing book, helping the mortgage brokers grow and succeed and grow their market share, and when that happens we'll continue to make decisions around our liquidity. Your line is open. Your line is open.
